name: High Maintenance
plot: A nameless cannabis delivery guy delivers his much-needed medication to stressed-out New Yorkers.

episodes.plot: The guy delivers to a cute chick stressed out by her psychotic boss.
episodes.title: Stevie

episodes.plot: A guy meets a clingy girl after a recent breakup. He calls the guy and finally sees the light.
episodes.title: Heidi

episodes.plot: The guy delivers to a lesbian couple and helps them with a rodent problem.
episodes.title: Jamie

episodes.plot: The guy delivers to a couple who are renting a room to inconsiderate guests on Airbnb.
episodes.title: Trixie

episodes.plot: The guy delivers to a sick woman and her isolated son and shares an uncomfortable moment with him.
episodes.title: Olivia

episodes.plot: The Guy delivers to an agoraphobic man who has lives with his mother and is obsessed with Helen.
episodes.title: Helen

episodes.plot: A couple's relationship is tested by a house guest.
episodes.title: Dinah

episodes.plot: The guy tries to cheer up Hannibal Buress.
episodes.title: Jonathan

episodes.plot: A private chef is hired to prepare a Passover dinner.
episodes.title: Elijah

episodes.plot: An uptight woman discusses Brad Pitts with her birdwatching friend who she discovers is very ill. She suggests that they smoke marijuana together to help with her friend's low appetite. Meanwhile, the guy gets high with two professional stoners.
episodes.title: Brad Pitts

episodes.plot: Scott, a young adult workout addict with a regimented lifestyle, meets Kitty, a cute girl from spin class, and they go on a date. When Kitty discovers the motivation behind Scott's odd sleep schedule, she is less than thrilled.
episodes.title: Qasim

episodes.plot: The Guy struggles to entertain his teenage niece.
episodes.title: Matilda

episodes.plot: One in the series of critically acclaimed High Maintenance shorts, Rachel focuses on Colin (Dan Stevens of Downton Abbey), a husband, stay-at-home father and writer. When he starts to fixate on his insecurities about past success and his secret tendencies to dress up in his wife's designer clothing, writer's block sets in. Procrastination, pot and fashion fill his days until he gets some needed encouragement from an unlikely source. This witty short is a beautiful portrait of acceptance from outside and in.
episodes.title: Rachel

episodes.plot: The guy plays matchmaker, sending two middle-aged marijuana enthusiasts on a first date.
episodes.title: Ruth

episodes.plot: A woman struggles with her fianc√©'s increasing paranoia and survival tendencies.
episodes.title: Geiger

episodes.plot: A frustrated cubicle-working idealist tries to make a difference in the world by becoming a teacher. His attempts fall flat and the experience challenges his optimism.
episodes.title: Genghis

episodes.plot: Reagan and Ezra get priced out of Williamsburg and head to a more affordable neighborhood where they learn you can't have it all when it comes to New York real estate.
episodes.title: Sufjan

episodes.plot: A hapless weed delivery girl fumbles her way through various misguided pursuits and steals some of the Guy's customers along the way.
episodes.title: Esme

episodes.plot: Six friends escape the city and head upstate for a weekend, but they spend more time worrying about their careers than enjoying themselves.
episodes.title: Sabrina
